rules.description: Cmd-Shift-Enter to Up then Enter in terminal apps
Ctrl + Arrow Keys to Option + Arrow Keys
Ctrl + Shift + Arrow Keys to Option + Shift + Arrow Keys
Ctrl + BS/Del Keys to Option + BS/Del Keys
Shift + Insert to Cmd + V
Shift Home to Shift Command Left
Shift End to Shift Command Right
Home to Control A
End to Control E
Remap £ to #
Remap section sign (§) from British Keyboard to US's backtick + plus minus (±) to tilde (~)

profiles.name: Joey config for US MacBook (set VK=ANSI)
